member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.DefinitionDatabase
member.summary: Provide an access to definition database.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.DefinitionDatabase.DefinitionDatabaseKey
member.summary: Key of the definition database name in Context.Items.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.DefinitionDatabase.DefinitionDatabaseObjKey
member.summary: Key of the definition database object in Context.Items.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.DefinitionDatabase.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the definition database name.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.DefinitionDatabase.Database
member.summary: Gets the definition database.
member.remarks: Definition database is the content database where analytics definitions are stored - e.g. engagement plans, campaigns, goals.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.Pipelines.Initialize.ShowXdbInfo
member.summary: Shows the xDB info.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.Pipelines.Initialize.ShowXdbInfo.Process(Sitecore.Pipelines.PipelineArgs)
member.summary: Runs the processor.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings
member.summary: Experience database settings.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the xDB is enabled.
member.value: true if xDB license is valid and xDB is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.HasValidLicense
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the license is valid.
member.value: true if the license is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.XdbDisabledUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL to redirect to, if the Xdb is disabled.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.MaxAcceptedClockDeviation
member.summary: Gets the largest acceptable deviation between the current serverâ€™s system time and the system time of other Sitecore servers in the same environment. The system uses this setting to compensate for any system time deviation between servers.
member.value: A containing the largest system clock deviation between Sitecore servers.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.DefaultDefinitionDatabase
member.summary: Gets the definition database.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking
member.summary: The xDB tracking settings.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking.Enabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tracking functionality is enabled.
member.value: true if the tracking functionality is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking.KeyBehaviorCache
member.summary: Key Behavior Cache settings.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking.KeyBehaviorCache.MaximumCacheEntryCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of items in the cache for a given category (goals, page events, etc.).

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking.KeyBehaviorCache.MaximumInteractionPeriod
member.summary: Gets the maximum time period (compared to interaction start date time) for interactions that can be included in cache rebuilds or updates.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.Tracking.KeyBehaviorCache.MaximumInteractionCount
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of interactions to examine during cache rebuilds or updates.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.GeoIps
member.summary: Defines GeoIp lookup related settings.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.Configuration.XdbSettings.GeoIps.CacheSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the cache.
